title: Bare
creator_credit: Wild Iris Productions, Liz Baulch, Amanda Roberts, Deborah Strutt and Elizabeth Taylor Sometimes
brief_description: The morning after the night before… Dee wakes up with a stranger in her bed, while her neighbour Paul is discovering new spice in an old relationship. But when inner city living finds them at closer quarters than they might expect, sensual surprises and unexpected desires are the order of the day. Keeping up with the Joneses was never this much fun!
creator_credit_for_label: Wild Iris Productions, Liz Baulch, Amanda Roberts, Deborah Strutt and Elizabeth Taylor Sometimes
